episode.title: 坊ちゃんとアリスの二人だけの歌
The Duke, Alice, and a Song for Two
Bocchan to Alice no Futari dake no Uta
episode.summary: Alice struggles with conflicting emotions after she learns from the Duke that he would break ties with his family if his mother doesn’t approve of them getting married after his curse is broken. Source: Funimation
